items.title: His20ry! Tribe ties AL mark on Kluber shutout
items.summary: Indians ace Corey Kluber was brilliant on Tuesday night, and he needed to be in order for Cleveland to rewrite baseball's record book. Kluber went the distance for a shutout and a 2-0 win over the Tigers at Progressive Field, as the Indians extended their club-record winning streak to 20 games, equaling the 2002 A's American League mark for consecutive victories.
items.content: Indians ace Corey Kluber was brilliant on Tuesday night, and he needed to be in order for Cleveland to rewrite baseball's record book.
